elements.text: You are in charge of a group of volunteers at an event for a local food bank. You become overwhelmed by the amount of tasks needing to be done, and you snap at a volunteer who makes a small mistake. They look at you with surprise as you take a breath and...

elements.name: Food Bank Event_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
